author: hossman
msg: clarifing javadocs for BooleanClause.SHOULD - two is not a magic number, the real issue is a lack of MUST clauses

author: reinhard
msg: add the block-plain archetype to the default build of Cocoon

author: reinhard
msg: * an archetype that creates the simplest possible block. You can use it, when you just
want to add yet another block to your Cocoon application.
+ one Java class and a JUnit test class
- no plugin configurations (expected that they are already configured
somewhere up the Maven 2 inheritance chain)
